website_summaries.verdict: A good budget option for a WiFi extender with built-in antennas for extra range.
pros: WiFi extender supports dual band wireless networks for different download speeds and network usage
Takes up a single outlet space on any wall in the house
cons: The body of the WiFi extender can run hot when plugged in for long periods of time

customer_reviews.title: Didn't & Won't Work
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work and was far too difficult to get someone on the phone. I thought it would be easy enough to troubleshoot, but even two tech guys came to the house and said "this just doesn't work for you and we aren't sure why. It's likely the product itself." Forgot to return it within 30 days and ate the $50. I'll give it to you for nothing. So frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: KimberDee37

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but doesn't perform
customer_reviews.text: product gives somewhat incomplete set up instructions and once you figure them out and it tells you it is connected, it isn't! Did everything as instructed, got feedback that all was perfect but it was not discoverable on any of my devices (smart tv, firestick, cell phone). I should add that I have a previous one, same model, and it works fine to extend the wifi to my Tesla in the garage. No idea why two versions of this one don't work.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: No frills just a basic Access Point/Extender
customer_reviews.text: Perfect when your WiFi is filtered/managed by a router or firewall. I tried others, but they'll mask the client's MAC address. This means having a controlled list of authorized or blocked devices on your Firewall or Router would be impossible to manage. However, with this Linksys Extender, the true MAC is passed along, so even static DHCP leases will work properly. I have mine set in AP mode, using the Gigabit port as the connection to the LAN. The range and speed are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Y

customer_reviews.title: too difficult to set up
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 of these (large house) and tried setting them up. Thought I was successful for a couple of them, but they stopped working. I have enough experience to troubleshoot and set up some networking, but called in a professional- even HE had problems setting it up, told me he usually had to call the company and have them walk through the setup. I have tried repeatedly, and I am giving up today. over $100 down the drain. The button setup does not work at all, perhaps that was set up to work only with routers having easy access, no passwords. Don't buy it.
customer_reviews.author: NCKitkat

customer_reviews.title: Set up OK, stopped working after a week.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my wi-fi signal is weak in the far end of the house. I had just bought a new smart TV and wanted to have the best possible signal. I installed in in what the instructions said was the ideal location (in fact, about 8 feet from the TV), and it worked OK for about a week. Since then, neither the TV nor my other devices seem to be able to maintain the signal, even when they are in the same room and only a few feet from the extender. I am probably going to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost the answer... but not.
customer_reviews.text: Set up went okay (I thought) and initially it said good signal and coverage. When I finalized everything, however, it would not give me an internet signal to connect with on my phone or tablet. I was bummed as it appeared to be "the answer." Thank you Amazon for your easy return policy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Connected using a PC, easy once you learn how.
customer_reviews.text: I needed to extend my WiFi from my computer room on the first floor to the the lower floor and patio. I had trouble making it work but once I discovered that by disconnecting my PC network line from my router and connecting it to the Linksys AC750 it was very easy. Once the setup was finished I took the AC750 to the lower level where it worked great once I added the new P/W to my mobile devices. The AC750 password is different than the P/W on the router. So make sure you add the new P/W to you devices before trying to connect.
customer_reviews.author: Jack R

customer_reviews.title: Instructions are useless
customer_reviews.text: Don’t bother getting this extender. I got it because my smart TV needs a network cable plugged in to work. The setup instructions are useless. WPS setup failed. Non-WPS setup failed. Tried resetting router. It wouldn’t allow me. Tried the instructions another reviewer left and it still failed. I’m returning this piece of crap.
customer_reviews.author: EnviroFirst

customer_reviews.title: Great Price for a Great Range Extender for 5G
customer_reviews.text: I was looking to extend 5G on my existing router i tried TP-Link range extender it didn’t work well , Linksys did the job well my 5G was extended with very easy setup (web setup) and all dead zone in my house has very reasonable fast speed which i wasn’t able to get before with TP Link . And price was Exactly my budget was !
customer_reviews.author: Zohaib

customer_reviews.title: Solves your big house streaming problems
customer_reviews.text: We have a fairly large house and I was getting so frustrated that the my wifi couldn't power all the devices on all the levels. Well, it turns out it could, we just needed this extender. Easy to set up (probably less than 5 minutes total) and it has fixed all of our streaming issues that caused so much frustration. I looked at all the reviews for all the other extenders and went with Linksys because that's what brand my router is and it works flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: R. O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Easy, easy
customer_reviews.text: Easy, easy, easy! The set-up instructions are clear and work! I bought another brand and could not get it to work no matter what I tried. This product worked right away. Set-up took less than 5 minutes. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: L. L. Marazoni

customer_reviews.title: You can't move it but a free feet away from the router an definitely not around any corners
customer_reviews.text: GARBAGE, WEAK SIGNAL After initial connection with router I moved it to the next room for a total of about 10/12 feet away from router around 1 corner no closed doors just a half a wall and couldn't get it to reconnect to the router again had to move it back closer to router so it now sits about 6 feet away straight view of router. Definitely will be returning and finding something better!
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: I should have declined the support person fee and plan and returned this purchase to Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: I had to call the support number for installation. It ended up costing me another $99. I don’t think it was worth it.I think I would choose not to purchase the plan and return the Linksys to Amazon, If I had to do it over again.
customer_reviews.author: Erie Buyer

customer_reviews.title: While the premise of this device is good, I had problems with it
customer_reviews.text: While the premise of this device is good, I had problems with it. It didn't work well with my Belkin router, causing it to lock up constantly. I know how to set up Wi-Fi and wired networks and have worked with computer systems for over 35 years, so the device's failure was not from my lack of trying or understanding how these things work. Unfortunately, I waited too long to return the range extender.
customer_reviews.author: K. Faaborg

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: It has a nice design and I am able to plug in an Ethernet cord to it for direct access, but the range is not the greatest nor are the speeds. Also it get hot due to the LED light on it which is large. I purchased it so I have more solid internet connection in my bedroom for working at home.
customer_reviews.author: Irish1620

customer_reviews.title: Pure Junk, DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Device stopped working after 2 months, tried resetting it via hard reset, didn't work, the device won't communicate via ethernet port or wi-fi so it can't be accessed and reset from web page, green light stays on but it never shows on my connected devices list. buy another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro A. Dohnert

customer_reviews.title: Great signal
customer_reviews.text: Live in a home where I have a dead spot and no matter what I did - couldn't get a signal. Purchased this ( easy to set up unit ) and YEAH YEAH YEAH - I'm able to get a great signal...
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Hathaway

customer_reviews.title: Definitely boosts your weak signal
customer_reviews.text: It does what it says it does which is boost your weak signal .... a little difficult to install but once you get it connected it works wonders
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: Only one band of the dual band extender worked, the 5 Ghz, and it continuously dropped the connection every few mintues. The installation instructions were easy to follow, and the online help was pretty much the same. The live online helps phone connection was so bad I could understand what he was saying most of the time. The unit just did not work.
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Extender seems great until you install it.
customer_reviews.text: This unit was easy to install, but began overheating and constantly restarting itself within one week of us receiving it. The tech. support just told us to return it.....
customer_reviews.author: Hillbilly Deluxe Sportfishing

customer_reviews.title: The product is "Overhyped"!!
customer_reviews.text: The first one, nor its replacement worked. Cost me over 6 hours on the phone with their support and customer service people, which was a nightmare. Barrier after barrier when you try to return defective products. Their goal is to sell to you whether the product works for you or not, just keep it and tough luck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great connection.
customer_reviews.text: This has truly helped my connection issues throughout my home. My only regret is I That I didn’t get one sooner. I did have trouble using the “easy button” to set up my connection, but that may have been more my router than this product. I used the app and did a manual set up just fine.
customer_reviews.author: JENNIFER L DE JONGH

customer_reviews.title: Gotcha
customer_reviews.text: What their product description omits is: the setup process requires you to create a new login id and password. I don't want that for many reasons. Deal killer. Kohls, here I come.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn E

customer_reviews.title: I have a high end linksys router so I thought this would be perfect addition, does not pick up signal from any ...
customer_reviews.text: not at all impressed, I have a high end linksys router so I thought this would be perfect addition, does not pick up signal from any kind of distance, does not transmit far at all, and loses connection and has to be reset. so that about covers it, not very good at anything.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WiFi extender
customer_reviews.text: Frankly I don’t see that this did much at all to extend my WiFi. Waste of my money
customer_reviews.author: K. Cohn

customer_reviews.title: Deos the job
customer_reviews.text: This Linksys AC750 Boost Dual-Band Wi-Fi Gigabit Range Extender / Repeater (RE6300) is easy to install and does exactly what it's supposed to do (pretty much a "set it and forget it" installation)... very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Music-Lover

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and easy to install. It has definitely helped in boosting my internet in my bedroom. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up and it boosted my signal on my back porch from 18 mbps to 210mbps
customer_reviews.author: Pilot

customer_reviews.title: Solves wifi signal problems
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and works great. I have several devices that had signal problems but this range extender solved that problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work in the specific layout of my home (interior brick wall).
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Have interior brick wall in my home and device doesn't seem to work well. Probably due to brick and even possibly due to internet service.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell Donaldson

customer_reviews.title: We had trouble
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure this works for others but we were not able to make it work. We got it set up close to the router as in the instructions; but then once we moved it (not that far from where we set it up) it never turned green. We have repeatedly done the steps and it has yet to work correctly in the "midway" location between the router and the area Wi-Fi is needed.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Williams

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. It helped bring me from fair to excellent ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. It helped bring me from fair to excellent for my internet in the far room in our house. Had to get help from the mfg. to set it up though. They give great support as the basic directions didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Peanut

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up sleek design.
customer_reviews.text: Love the sleek design. Like the idea you don't have to measure bars, one bar is enough. Set up was very simple. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Yomiko

customer_reviews.title: Very Disapointed
customer_reviews.text: After 30 days of use it froze and would not reset. Online research indicated this is a common problem.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: extension of wifi within my house.
customer_reviews.text: I was able to give approximately 100 feet to my wifi to the garage and patio with this product
customer_reviews.author: eastbayddt

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for us!
customer_reviews.text: We had issues with getting good wifi on our upstairs back bedroom. We put this upstairs (half way between our router and bedroom) and it worked like a charm! We can now stream movies via netfllix without it stopping and I can now use my computer and phone on wifi. Was very easy to link up to our router.
customer_reviews.author: JMT9

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: First I purchased a TP-Link N300 from Amazon and it was a piece of junk so I took a stab at this one and it works as intended. All of them are Easy to install however this one actually works and woks well or as intended. For now i am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: VClan

customer_reviews.title: Could not connect
customer_reviews.text: The signal carried far but I could not connect any devices to the ext ip address, my garage my tcmv my phone.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. After a while it starts bugging out and you have to reset it. Sometimes the signal dies without no causes and then it comes back after 5 minutes to 1 day. After a power outage, it completely stopped working and i’ve done everything to try to fix (from resetting the router and moving the extender closer router).
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Perfect perfection Wi-Fi
customer_reviews.text: This Wi-Fi extender is exactly what I was looking for and I'm very impressed with it.
customer_reviews.author: Owen and Ashley Neese

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: After 3 months, it just died on me. Linksys and Amazon only has a 30 day warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Roman Garza

customer_reviews.title: works but you end up with second wi-fi network so ...
customer_reviews.text: works but you end up with second wi-fi network so the equipment that use this have to log into it with new stuff
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Reliable signal extender
customer_reviews.text: I rated this product 4 stars because is solved my signal issue by providing a consistent signal to the outer areas of my house. However, I did not rate this a 5 star product because it did not give the signal strength I was hoping for (4 or 5 bars out of 5). Overall, I would purchase this product again due to the easy set up (which only had 3 steps), nice design, and effectiveness.
customer_reviews.author: Breil

customer_reviews.title: nice range extender
customer_reviews.text: Easy to connect and I did it by cell phone. Works better than one I've bought for much more money. 5 gig and now internet is super fast even in the neighbors house. Excellent range. Like it a lot and works with at&t.
customer_reviews.author: don

customer_reviews.title: Terrible info online to connect, support had no clue.
customer_reviews.text: After three tries with support, taking over 3 hours in all, it still wouldn't connect to wifi, and they had no idea how to address the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Works like charm for what it is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: LBA

customer_reviews.title: Don’t get it?
customer_reviews.text: It’s weak. Great reviews but, it’s not an extender. It has its own WIFI number that you have to connect to with a weak signal. If you want an “extender” I hear Google is the way to go
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Works as described
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with how well this device boosted the wi-go signal in my home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: Would not maintain a good connection and when it did briefly have one there was little to no difference in signal strength.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DC plug is not the Usual wall outlet plug i live in California
customer_reviews.text: DC plug is not the Usual wall outlet plug & 95% of wall outlets in California Do Not use the kind of outlet this device has
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Wifi on my whole property now!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so i could stream my music in my yard while staying on wi-fi and this delivered! We have about a 1/2 acre lot and I have wi-fi at all corners now, works great!
customer_reviews.author: Dana Hosko

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a older model and am very pleased with its function. For me, the trick for optimal results was the placement of the unit and being in the green zone of the spot finder.
customer_reviews.author: kwm'smom

customer_reviews.title: It didn't help extend our signal.
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to set up, but it did not help extend our wifi. The signal still kept dropping. Wasn't worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Mother Kate

customer_reviews.title: Works  works works
customer_reviews.text: I love this product it's everything it says it is and I have never had such a strong signal on all my devices would buy again in a mim

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This wifi extender worked right out of the box by following the instructions, it provided us more distance to access our home network further away from the main router as stated.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Yoars

customer_reviews.title: Signal Boost
customer_reviews.text: Bought the extender to amplify the wifi signal downstairs in order to use the Ring Doorbell Pro. Works like a charm, recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This unit has been a great fix for an issue we were having with our internet system.

customer_reviews.text: Seems like it has really increased our signal from the back of house in fact we are showing up neighbors wifi on our list of available ones so it must be really strong!

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Set Up
customer_reviews.text: I have used Link Sys Range expanders in the past and they just work

customer_reviews.title: Works just fine for the first few weeks
customer_reviews.text: Works just fine for the first few weeks. It still works great, but now there there is a seriously hugh pitched frequency coming out if it. Extremely annoying!
customer_reviews.author: BP

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Wi-Fi Range Extender
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, and this range extender makes my in home Wi-Fi faster and more reliable, especially for my Canon wireless printer.

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time or money
customer_reviews.text: This is a piece of junk. The only thing it does well is slow down and hang your existing network. Unfortunately I missed my refund window by 2 days.

customer_reviews.text: It is adequate. I have a small (2,200 sq ft) house and had problems getting the wi fi signal in all areas. This does extend the range, but the signal is not strong.

customer_reviews.text: Booster works really well. It was easy to place and connect. Dead spots in master bedroom have gone away.

customer_reviews.title: Unsealed previously opened box
customer_reviews.text: Received item in a box that was previously opened with seals cut and no install instructions. Will be returning!

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me, but...
customer_reviews.text: Got it set up relatively easily and was excited to see a good signal in most areas of my house. That lasted for about 20 minutes and then it dropped and I couldn’t even get into the original network. Reset the whole thing and tried again - same thing happened. To be fair, part of my problem may have been that I live in an old stone farmhouse so the walls are ridiculously thick. But, I did see a few other reviews that said the same thing happened to them, so who knows. I ended up returning it and buying the pods available from my internet provider. They were more expensive but they’ve worked well for a few weeks now.
customer_reviews.author: Dragonfly

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't get the device to work when following the linking instructions. Re-read the directions, tried repeatedly, gave up.

customer_reviews.title: Did not meet my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up, but performance just ok, not great. Range is kind of short. I have a two story 3700 as Dr home and this wi-fi range extender did not meet my expectations.

customer_reviews.title: Maybe it was MY home environment but truthfully it did ...
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it was MY home environment but truthfully it did not do such a big upgrade to my WiFi performance.

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Did not work for me and has been sitting around my place, spent too much money on this for nothing

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad booster, I had a little trouble setting it up, but finally got it.
customer_reviews.author: Care

customer_reviews.title: Working Great...Easy to Set Up
customer_reviews.text: I am now using two of these. I easily used the manual/web interface to configure each one to work exclusively as extenders for my growing installation of R_eye_n_gee Devices. They work very well, and we're easy to configure and connect the R devices to. Just remember to keep straight what the extender device name and address is, vs the SSID and LAN IP of the SSID. They are working much better than, and we're only a little more expensive than extender methods/models suggested by R. My main router is a much older, but still well working Linksys wifi router, upgraded by bridging in a newer AC Linksys Wifi router serving a 3 level, 4500 Sq ft residence.
customer_reviews.author: Ol'Fart

customer_reviews.title: It does add range
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok and does add range but uses a lot of WiFi

customer_reviews.text: Good product when it works but now it fails to have a consistent connection and it's only a month old. Not worth it.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This item was purchased for someone else. They say it is doing the job!

Meantime I typed one wrong character apparently, when I was going to the Linksys website and was redirected to a scam linksys website where they tried to tell me my computer was compromised and tried sell me tech support for my ailing computer etc etc etc. Watch out for that!

customer_reviews.title: works great

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work as well as I hoped
customer_reviews.text: This thing didn't do much to boost my range. I put it in the back corner of my house and the rooms in that area have slightly better speeds but I still have terrible wifi outdoors even right outside from where the unit is plugged in. I'm going to try another extender.

customer_reviews.title: It works as expected
customer_reviews.text: It works as expected - I paired it with my Linksys 1900AC and I have whole house (as well as my tool shed, decks, etc) coverage.

customer_reviews.title: We were told just plug it in the wall which ...
customer_reviews.text: We were told just plug it in the wall which we did and didn't seem to be noticing any change apparently we have to run a cord from it all down our home to plug in in a 4 bedroom I'm not sure how we're supposed to manage with a cord going all through our house but for us this was a bust so far anyone have any help or ideas
customer_reviews.author: Lynette S. P.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This product keeps dropping offline & has no internet connectivity
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this extender to replace a Net Gear unit that never worked properly. More than happy with this Linksys wifi extender. Easy to set up and get running. At one point I did have to call the Linksys help line but despite not being able to always understand the representative, she had the units set up and working perfectly in about 5 minutes. I would recommend this Wi-fi extender to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Rinaldi

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up but have to keep rebooting to connect
customer_reviews.author: E. Plourde

customer_reviews.title: Take a look at some TP link choices too/first
customer_reviews.text: Actually getting better range and stronger signal from the less expensive TP link extender. Less wifi network drops as well. Smh, what happened to the good old WRT 64 days of linksys/Cisco past? $40 more and not as good as TP LINK, sad
customer_reviews.author: sean d.

customer_reviews.title: Poor performing product.
customer_reviews.text: Worthless. I have a Linksys router that works fine and this item completely fails to extend the signal. It constantly loses the connection and I have to wait and wait and wait for the "Booster" to reset. I am much better off working directly from the router's signal.
customer_reviews.author: FlyGuy

customer_reviews.title: Streaming like a MAD WOMAN!  :)
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS....got it and it was installed in 10 minutes from package opening to TV WORKING finally....streaming like a mad woman! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Gray

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Received a free sample from Linksys in exchange my honest feedback. The product has an easy setup, excellent exterior and good signal for the extender. I like it since the original signal coverage is not enough, like it!!
customer_reviews.author: Scott L

customer_reviews.title: A must have for your home
customer_reviews.text: Great device and easy to set up. In 10 minutes I had it out of the box and working on my network. This has really helped for a family with multiple electronic devices being used in one house.
customer_reviews.author: RJ Sturgill

product_meta.title: Linksys RE6300 AC750 Boost Dual-Band Wi-Fi Gigabit Range Extender / Repeater
product_meta.description: The new Linksys AC750 Boost Dual-Band Wi-Fi Range Extender with Exclusive Spot Finder Technology eliminates Wi-Fi dead zones throughout a home including, patio, garage, second floors and more. With a simple setup with Push Button Connect and Spot Finder Technology for optimal placement and performance it will boost your Wi-Fi signal coverage up to 6,500 square feet. Cross band Technology maximizes simultaneous use of dual bands while Beam forming focuses and strengthens the Wi-Fi signal. With Wi-Fi speeds up to N300 & AC433 Mbps you will expand your Wi-Fi coverage in large and multi-storied homes with two adjustable, external antennas. You will gain enhanced wired speeds for a Smart TV, gaming console, Blu-ray Disc player other Wi-Fi device using the Gigabit Ethernet port. Works with all Wi-Fi routers.
feature_bullets: Cross band Technology maximizes simultaneous use of dual bands while Beam forming focuses and strengthens the Wi-Fi signal
Simple setup with Push Button Connect and Spot Finder Technology for optimal placement and performance
Boosts Wi Fi signal coverage up to 6,500 square feet
Eliminates Wi Fi dead zones throughout a home including, patio, garage, second floors and more
Wi Fi Speeds up to N300 + AC433 Mbps; Up to 2.9X Faster than N Technology
Expand Wi Fi coverage in large and multi storied homes with 2 adjustable, external antennas
Gain enhanced wired speeds for a Smart TV, gaming console, Blue ray Disc player other Wi Fi device using the Gigabit Ethernet port
Works with all Wi Fi Routers
